name: Mysterious Man
description:
-----------------------------------------------MOVE SET--------------------------------------------
Arrow Keys to move
Optional Z to jump
Down Arrow while standing on a rock to pick it up.
Press A to throw it.
X to attack.
Space to use special abilities.
-----------------------------------------------ABILITY LIST-----------------------------------------
GLIDE: Hold space down in the air to fall down slower.
EXTRA JUMPS: Press space in the air to jump a second time, or press space while on the ground to jump higher than usual.
------------------------------------------------DISCORD--------------------------------------------
discord
